isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

methods.constructor: Network: Kovan Oracle: 0xc57B33452b4F7BB189bB5AfaE9cc4aBa1f7a4FD8 Job ID: d5270d1c311941d0b08bead21fea7747 Fee: 0.1 LINK

fulfill(bytes32,uint256).notice: Receive the response in the form of uint256

requestData(string,string,int256).notice: Create a Chainlink request to retrieve API response, find the target data, then multiply by timesAmount (to remove decimal places from data).
